loadData

private Grid loadData()
Returns a Grid that is loaded from the parsed XML file.

Returns:
A Grid containing all the land information

newClient

public void newClient(ServerMessages client,
                      java.lang.String name)
Handles a new client connection. Checks if the client already exists. Creates a ServerOperator for the client. Sends needed simulation parameters to the client.

Parameters:
client - The socket of the new client.
name - The team name of the new client.

setupAuction

public void setupAuction()
Setup a new auction by gathering Bid queues from the ServerOperators and starting Auction.

processSeismicRequests

public void processSeismicRequests()
Process Seismic requests by going through every operator's seismic queue and returning the information.
